survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Beauty Box Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from subscribers of beauty box services to assess satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How long have you been subscribed to a beauty box service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to ensure clarity. Helps segment respondents by subscription tenure.

script.question_text: How long have you been subscribed to a beauty box service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following beauty box brands have you subscribed to? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option for additional brands.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). 'Other' should trigger a text input field.

script.question_text: Which of the following beauty box brands have you subscribed to? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of products included in your beauty box?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Helps identify product variety preferences.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of products included in your beauty box?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your beauty box service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Useful for identifying unmet needs.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your beauty box service?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to continue your beauty box subscription in the next 6 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to gauge retention likelihood. Helps predict churn.

script.question_text: How likely are you to continue your beauty box subscription in the next 6 months?
